channel.title: Fix for Norton's update error messages LU1875 & etc
channel.description:
I had this problem and want to share just incase there is someone that has the same problem. Error: "LU1875 This update failed during its preprocessing welcome text phase"
Solution.
Unregiter and Re-register Navlucbk.dll file.
Here is a simple way to do. Follow these instructions:
1. Unregister Navlucbk.dll (C:\program files\norton antivirus\navlucbk.dll) To unregister a. Click Start > Run b. In the Run dialogue box type or paste: regsvr32 /u â€œc:\program files\norton antivirus\navlucbk.dll
2. Reregister a. Click Start > Run b. In the Run dialogue box type or paste regsvr32 â€œc:\program files\norton antivirus\navlucbk.dll
3. Perform a disk Cleanup 4. Restart the Computer 5. Run liveupdate again
This has worked for me and many friends plenty of times and it's a simple trick. Works like a charm! :D

item.title: Fix for Norton's update error messages LU1875 & etc
item.dc:creator: @cawagula cawagula
item.description:
@cawagula wrote:

I had this problem and want to share just incase there is someone that has the same problem.
Error: “LU1875 This update failed during its preprocessing welcome text phase”

Solution.

Unregiter and Re-register Navlucbk.dll file.

Here is a simple way to do. Follow these instructions:

  1. Unregister Navlucbk.dll (C:\program files\norton antivirus\navlucbk.dll)
    To unregister
    a. Click Start > Run
    b. In the Run dialogue box type or paste:
    regsvr32 /u â€œc:\program files\norton antivirus\navlucbk.dll

  2. Reregister
    a. Click Start > Run
    b. In the Run dialogue box type or paste
    regsvr32 â€œc:\program files\norton antivirus\navlucbk.dll

  3. Perform a disk Cleanup

  4. Restart the Computer

  5. Run liveupdate again

This has worked for me and many friends plenty of times and it’s a simple trick. Works like a charm!

Read full topic
item.source: Fix for Norton's update error messages LU1875 & etc
